name: Box Portals
description:
This game is all about keeping those boxes under control! If they enter the egde of the screen, you lose. Keep draging the boxes into the middle portal to gain points. The longer you survive, the more boxes will spawn. 

The game should be played in full screen

PURPLE BOXES will give you +10 points and must be returned to the middle portal in order to keep going.

GREEN BOXES will move at a much faster speed and give you +30 points. If you cannot return them to the middle portal, you will not lose as these boxes are designed to be a bonus. 

YELLOW BOXES will move even faster and give you +100 points. As with the green boxes, the yellow ones will also not cause you to lose if they reach the end of the screen.

There was sadly no more time left, so we were not able to add audio to the game, but we will continue to update an fix the game even after this game jam and hopefully release it on both mobile and pc!

 Have fun and make sure the boxes are not out of control!
